resources.string: Get fast loan instantly. Loans are disbursed within 24-72 hours. After approval your loan will be disbursed to your registered Mpesa account

Loan amount range from Ksh 500 - Ksh 25,000. Tenor range from 90 days(3 months) to six months. 12.5% interest is charged with no facilitation or service fees. We will never ask for other hidden charges. To visualize this if you borrow 5,000 for repayment period of one year with 12.5% interest rate the total interest rate will be 5,000 * 12.5 = 625 Ksh. Effective APR will be 47.2% - 125.2%.

Thank you for allowing us to help you with your financial needs. We are committed to serve our customers in adherence to the prescribed codes of conducts and accounting profession. We are pleased to have you on-board and are eager and ready to serve you at our level best.

You qualify for a loan up to 5000 /=. Continue borrowing with us and repaying your loan to improve your credit score. The loan limit are set using your credit score arrived from credit bureau CRB. Several factors affect your credibility which include your suitability based on money transactions and reliability from previous transactions.

Thank you for your interest in our services. You currently do not have an active loan. From our record you have not applied for a loan with us. To apply for a loan go back to the application page and enter the amount you wish to apply. We will review your application and disburse the amount when your application has been approved. Thank you.
Your loan application is being reviewed. Please wait patiently as we review your application. You will get a confirmation message to update you on the status of your request.

We have received your loan application.After review and approval we will disburse the amount to your registered phone number that is number you used to register to this service. We will take not more than 24â€“72hrs to complete the approval process. Wait patiently as we review your loan application. Check your loan status regularly to keep track of the progress. Any application rejection will be accompanied with a reason.
